Name: Form A Application
Description: Create an application for financial remedy by contested

Name: Amend Case
EventEnablingCondition: typeOfApplication!="Under paragraph 1 or 2 of schedule 1 children act 1989"

Name: Bulk Scanning - Case Create
Description: Create a case from scanned documents

Name: Bulk Scanning - Case Update
Description: Update a case adding additional data from scanned documents to an existing case

Name: Create General Application
Description: Deprecated -Kept as needed this for existing cases

Name: Revert to Prepare For Hearing
Description: Revert Case State to Prepare For Hearing

Name: List for Interim Hearing
Description: Above event is not in use

Name: Manage Interveners
Description: Manage Interveners isolate events for Intervener's Solicitor's

Name: Share Selected Documents
Description: This event should allow solicitors on a case to share selected documents with other solicitors

Name: Clear Applicant Policy
Description: Clear Applicant Policy - when applicant organisation not valid any more for some reason

Name: Clear Respondent Policy
Description: Clear Respondent Policy - when respondent organisation not valid any more for some reason
